name: Lab Cat Escape
description: Prepare for an exhilarating adventure in "Lab Cat Escape," an action-packed endless runner game that will put your skills to the test. Take control of a clever lab cat and navigate through a perilous laboratory filled with obstacles, utilizing your gravity-switching abilities to dodge and overcome challenges. It's time to run, switch gravity, and achieve the highest scores in this fast-paced and addictive runner!
